title: Variant
description: Schema for submitting a human genetic varient.

dbxref.title: External identifiers
dbxref.description: Unique identifiers from external resources (e.g. ClinVar, dbVar).

items.title: External identifier
items.description: A unique identifier from external resource (e.g. HGNC, GeneID, UniProtKB or ENSEMBL).
items.comment: Submit as database name:target name (e.g. HGNC:HMFN0395, GeneID:22809)

chromosomal_coordinates.title: Gene
chromosomal_coordinates.description: HGNC or MGI identifier for the target.
chromosomal_coordinates.comment: Submit only the identifier (e.g. HMFN0395 or 22809).

label.title: Descriptive name of variant
label.description: Common name for the target including post-translational modifications, if any.
